txt.en: 'Hello there. You look like just the type Tad has been looking for. Young Leafcutter has been seeking adventurers throughout Bree and has asked me to send them his way when I see them.\n\n'If you would, go and visit Tad Leafcutter. He should be west of the South-gate here in Bree.  Make sure you tell him I sent you; I don't get paid if they don't get sent by me.'
'Thomas Thistlewool sent you? Yes, yes, I will make sure he receives his coin, I have something much more important to discuss with you.'
Tad Leafcutter has asked for adventurers throughout Bree to come and speak with him.
Tad Leafcutter can be found outside the Bree Hunting Lodge west of the South-gate of Bree.\n\nTad Leafcutter has asked that adventurers in Bree come and speak with him.
